content: different color in bold notes are written in a different color in brackets to help you through the pattern or indicate which stitches to work into or skip 2 k a m e crochet designs 2024 by krisztina anna matejcsok-edomer all rights reserved instructions to start with c1 daffodil yellow magic_ring round 1 chain 1 12 double_crochet into the ring join with a slip_stitch to first double_crochet fasten_off 12 double_crochet round 2 join c2 paper white in any double_crochet of last round chain 1 1 popcorn st in same st alternatively you can join with a standing double_crochet and make your first popcorn that way chain 2 1 popcorn st in next st chain 2 11 times join with a slip_stitch to first popcorn st fasten_off 12 popcorn sts 12 x chain 2 space round 3 join c3 washed teal with a standing double_crochet video help of how to make a standing double crochet https //youtu be/me51dql8tpy in any chain 2 space of last round 2 double_crochet in same space skip next st popcorn st 3 double_crochet in next chain 2 space skip next st popcorn st 11 times join with a slip_stitch to first double_crochet fasten_off 36 double_crochet round 4 join c1 daffodil yellow with a standing single_crochet video help of how to make a standing single crochet https //youtu be/u8_njvr30vs in any space between the 3 double_crochet groups 1 single_crochet in next 3 sts note the single_crochet between the 3 double_crochet groups might hide the first st 1 single_crochet in space between the 3 double_crochet groups 1 single_crochet in next 3 sts 11 times join with a slip_stitch to first single_crochet fasten_off 48 single_crochet round 5 join c3 washed teal with a standing single_crochet in any single_crochet between the 3 double_crochet groups from previous round skip 3 sts 9 treble_crochet in next st skip 3 sts 1 single_crochet in next 5 sts skip 3 sts 9 treble_crochet in next st skip 3 sts 1 single_crochet in next 10 sts 1 half_double_crochet in next 2 sts 2 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet chain 1 1 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next st 2 double_crochet in next st 1 half_double_crochet in next 2 sts 1 single_crochet in next 9 sts join with a slip_stitch to first single_crochet fasten_off 25 single_crochet 4 half_double_crochet 8 double_crochet 2 x 9 treble_crochet shells 1 x chain 1 space round 6 join c4 dusty rose with a standing single_crochet in the 2nd last st of last round that s the 3rd single_crochet to the right from the first treble_crochet shell skip 2 sts 2 double_crochet in next 9 sts skip 2 sts 1 single_crochet in next st skip 2 sts 2 double_crochet in next 9 sts skip 2 sts 1 single_crochet in next 8 sts 1 half_double_crochet in next 6 sts 2 half_double_crochet chain 1 2 half_double_crochet in next chain 1 space 1 half_double_crochet in next 6 sts 1 single_crochet in next 7 sts join with a
